case.summary: Motion by defendants for stay or dismissal of action on basis that plaintiff had not exhausted remedies available under union constitution and on basis that US had exclusive jurisdiction over plaintiff's claims -- Plaintiff sued officer of his union and union -- Plaintiff alleged union's credibility diminished as it was under supervision of International Union since 2004 -- HELD: Motion allowed -- Action stayed until remedies under union constitution had been exhausted -- Considering expense of a trial and duty to support proper in-house resolution of union matters supported defendant's position that matter should be resolved through in house process before being determined at court level.
